@Matt_Terrill @_danielrosado Time. Marvel Studios has made a point of stacking multiple big movies into the slates each year, and so their production schedules are insanely crunched. There’s just not time to design, prep, and execute something like, say, LotR or Mad Max: Fury Road on those timelines.

I know I drag it a lot but I can't get over how awful the UHD of Mad Max Fury Road is. Even on an OLED TV with a good player, I see banding and haloing throughout.

The colours still look questionable compared to SDR and the VFX look so distractingly obvious in 4K.

The chariot race in Ben-Hur puts Mad Max Fury Road to shame.

There, I said it.
